title: Can't specify custom quarkus.profile when running tests
body:
### Describe the bug

Neither `./gradlew -Dquarkus.profile=my-profile test` nor `QUARKUS_PROFILE=my-profile ./gradlew test` will run my tests using my configuration as defined in `src/main/resources/application-my-profile.yml`. It ignores this and just loads the `test` profile all the time. I can't get this to work in my IDE either when specifying these VM args or ENV vars and running there (intellij). How can I acheive this?

### Expected behavior

`./gradlew -Dquarkus.profile=my-profile test` should load my config located in `src/main/resources/application-my-profile.yml`

### Actual behavior

see above

### How to Reproduce?

see above
